member.name: T:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelperMethods
member.summary: Provides extension methods for extension point .

member.name: M:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelperMethods.PageBuilderScripts(Kentico.Web.Mvc.ExtensionPoint{System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper},System.String[])
member.summary: Renders necessary scripts for Page builder feature.
member.param: Additional custom scripts required for the Page builder.
member.returns: Returns HTML markup with script tags for scripts or returns null if edit mode is not initialized.
member.exception: Thrown when the Page builder has not been initialized yet.

member.name: M:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelperMethods.PageBuilderStyles(Kentico.Web.Mvc.ExtensionPoint{System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper},System.String[])
member.summary: Renders necessary stylesheet link tags for Page builder feature.
member.param: Additional custom stylesheet files required for the Page builder.
member.returns: Returns HTML markup with link tags for stylesheets or returns null if edit mode is not initialized.

member.name: M:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelperMethods.PageBuilderScriptsInternal(Kentico.Web.Mvc.ExtensionPoint{System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},Kentico.Builder.Web.Mvc.IAllowedDomainsRetriever,Kentico.Builder.Web.Mvc.IComponentLocalizationService)
member.summary: Renders necessary scripts for Page builder feature.
member.param: Additional scripts required for the Page builder.
Retriever of allowed domains to check origin of post messages on client.
Localization service to provide context of a culture.
member.returns: Returns HTML markup with script tags for scripts or returns null if edit mode is not initialized.

member.name: M:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelperMethods.WidgetZone(Kentico.Web.Mvc.ExtensionPoint{System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper})
member.summary: Renders widget zone markup.
member.returns: Returns HTML markup for widget zone container for edit mode.
member.remarks: For the live site, null value is returned. The HTML markup of widgets included in the zone is rendered directly to the response.

member.name: M:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelperMethods.WidgetZoneInternal(Kentico.Web.Mvc.ExtensionPoint{System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper},Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.IWidgetZoneRenderer,Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.IPageConfigurationRetriever,Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.IComponentDefinitionProvider)

member.name: M:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelperMethods.EditableArea(Kentico.Web.Mvc.ExtensionPoint{System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper},System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Renders editable area markup.
member.param: Identifier of a section to be used as an initial one for the area.
Identifiers of allowed widgets in the area. If none provided all widgets are allowed.
member.returns: Returns HTML markup for editable area container for edit mode.
member.remarks: For the live site, null value is returned. The HTML markup of area and widgets included in the zones is rendered directly to the response.
member.exception: Thrown when is empty or whitespace.

member.summary: Renders editable area markup.
member.param: Identifier of a section to be used as an initial one for the area.

member.name: T:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.RegisterSectionAttribute
member.summary: Registers a section definition to be used within Page builder feature.

member.name: M:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.RegisterSectionAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: Unique identifier of the section definition.
Type of the section controller to register.
member.remarks: Make sure to provide unique identifier for the section definition from the start. This identifier is used within the page configuration and any further change can lead to incorrect configuration load. Consider specifying identifier in format 'CompanyName.ModuleName.SectionName', e.g. 'Kentico.Content.SingleColumn'.

member.name: T:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.RegisterWidgetAttribute
member.summary: Registers a widget definition to be used within Page builder feature.

member.name: M:Kentico.PageBuilder.Web.Mvc.RegisterWidgetAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: Unique identifier of the widget definition.
Type of the widget controller to register.
member.remarks: Make sure to provide unique identifier for the widget definition from the start. This identifier is used within the page configuration of widgets and any further change can lead to incorrect configuration load. Consider specifying identifier in format 'CompanyName.ModuleName.WidgetName', e.g. 'Kentico.Content.ArticlesListWidget'.
